xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootElementName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:element name="{$rootElementName}"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@* | node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="name()='adapter-name'"> <adapter-name> <xsl:value-of select="//ping-adapter-name/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </adapter-name> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="name()='invocation-mechanism'"> <invocation-mechanism> <xsl:value-of select="//ping-mechanism/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </invocation-mechanism> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@* | node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//sourceData/componentType/text() = 'NT_LOGICAL_DISKS'"> <xsl:value-of select="100 - //metricsData/metricValue/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//metricsData/metricValue/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: Connection details for the host not found. Exiting operation

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output cdata-section-elements="action" indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <annotation-data> <xsl:value-of select="//error/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:for-each select="//line[.!='bash-2.03$']"> <xsl:if test="string(.)!="""> <xsl:value-of select="." /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </annotation-data> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Ping failed. Can not verify service status. </xsl:text> <xsl:text></xsl:text> ${ping output} </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(substring-after(., '.'))) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="translate(substring-after(., '.'), 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ', 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="domain"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain/@name = '${domain}'">${domain}</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="contains('${domain}', //domain/@name)"> <xsl:value-of select="//domain/@name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="host"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}']/@name = '${host name}'">${host name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}' and @name = $host])"> <xsl:value-of select="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}' and @name = $host]/triage/command/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text></xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//sourceData/componentType/text() = 'NT_LOGICAL_DISKS'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(//sourceData/componentCaption/text(), "@")"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after(//sourceData/componentCaption/text(), '@')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//sourceData/componentCaption/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//sourceData/componentType/text() = 'NUK_FileSystem'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(//sourceData/componentCaption/text(), "@")"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before(//sourceData/componentCaption/text(), '@')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//sourceData/componentCaption/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <command> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(.) > 1"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains("${os type}", "windows")"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(., '${dir}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="concat(.,"/", '${dir}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"></xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </command> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: Triage command does not exist in configuration.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <connection-details> <xsl:copy-of select="//invocation-mechanism" /> <xsl:copy-of select="//adapter-name" /> <hostname> <xsl:value-of select="//component/@name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </hostname> <xsl:copy-of select="//username" /> <xsl:copy-of select="//password" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="//adapter-options/*" mode="adapter-options" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="//command-options/*" mode="command-options" /> </connection-details> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()" mode="adapter-options"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()" mode="command-options"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:apply-templates select="//line" /> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="line"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- </xsl:text> ${command output} </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</xsl:text> $[triage data] <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Triage successful. Process is not running.</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</xsl:text> $[triage data] <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Triage successful. Process is not running.</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="command command-output " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <triage-output> <status>${triage status}</status> <command>${command}</command> <command-output> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </command-output> <remediation-required>${remediation required}</remediation-required> <start-time>${start time}</start-time> <end-time>${end time}</end-time> </triage-output> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
